sourcesContent:
<form (submit)="updateRessource()">
    <label for="id">ID :</label>
    <input id="id" [(ngModel)]="ressource.idRessource" name="id" required />
  
    <label for="nom">Nom :</label>
    <input id="nom" [(ngModel)]="ressource.nomRessource" name="nom" required />
  
    <label for="nombre">Nombre :</label>
    <input id="nombre" type="number" [(ngModel)]="ressource.nombreRessource" name="nombre" required />
  
    <label for="type">Type :</label>
    <input id="type" [(ngModel)]="ressource.typesRessource" name="type" required />
  
    <button type="submit">Mettre à jour</button>
  </form>
